# Markdown 指南

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/markdown-zhinan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/markdown-zhinan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install markdown-zhinan
markdown-zhinan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g markdown-zhinan
markdown-zhinan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
